channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Likely Samsung Galaxy S26 Upgrade Now Makes Perfect Sense
item.description: The Galaxy S26 will likely feature a new design inspired by the Galaxy Z Fold 7.

item.title: AI Will Make The ‘Infinite Workday’ Worse — Unless We Act Differently
item.description: Many workers report feeling overwhelmed by employers' expectations and a lack of work-life boundaries. How can AI help — and when is it part of the pr...

item.title: Stanford Analyzes Worker Preferences For AI
item.description: A detailed study helps us to see where we can best apply AI in the workplace.

item.title: The Five Fintech Jobs Gen AI Will Replace First
item.description: Survivors will be those who learn to collaborate with AI, leveraging technology to amplify their human capacity for strategy, creativity and judgment.

item.title: Today’s NYT Strands Puzzle: Hints, Spangram And Answers For Tuesday, July 22nd

item.title: Resilience is a practice

item.title: Lunging

item.title: Finding the difficult work
